response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and value, I would like to propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product for $7,200. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a discounted price. Please let me know if you are interested in taking advantage of this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
